General.Name: Unichem Laboratories Limited
General.Description: Unichem Laboratories Limited, a pharmaceutical company, manufactures and sells pharmaceutical products worldwide. It offers formulation products that address various therapeutic areas, such as gastroenterology, cardiology, diabetology, psychiatry, neurology, anti-bacterial, anti-infective, and pain management; and active pharmaceutical ingredients, as well as contract manufacturing services. The company was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
